emogg.settings.title: Emogg设置
If this mode is enabled, then when using the mod, additional information will be provided, both inside the GUI and in the console. This mode can lead to a decrease in performance, so enabling this mode should be carried out if it is really necessary

emogg.settings.option.reload_all.title: 刷新表情
emogg.settings.option.reload_all.descrip: 清空缓存并使表情重新加载。
